body.p:
Feb 25th 1862
To his Excelency B. Magoffin Gov of Ky.

Your Petitioners would most respectfully represent to your excellency that at the present to term of the Rowan Court Circuit Court I was fined ten dollars for an assault on Jerry Ham the offence was commited under circumstances of great aggreavation and I ask the interpostion of Executive clemency for the remission of said fine, and your petitioner will be ever grateful
We the undersigned believe the petition of Morgan McClorg is a case that justly demands the pardoning power, we therefore pray your excelency to interpose in his behalf
